body:
Let's look at the most influential **Swing States** for the 2020 US Election.

We'll list them and share **live predictions** for each based on the most accurate source. Not polls, but betting data.

The betting data shows 12 states to watch:

* Arizona
* Florida
* Georgia
* Iowa
* Michigan
* Minnesota
* New Hampshire
* North Carolina
* Ohio
* Pennsylvania
* Texas
* Wisconsin

- - -

## **Swing States: Live Predictions**

In alphabetical order, we'll show you all the swing states and their live probabilities.

Remember, these graphs are **LIVE** and update any time the market moves. 

**Bookmark this page** and you'll know each state's exact probability. 

- - -

## **[Arizona](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/arizona-polls-and-election-betting)**

11 of the last 12 elections have been Republican.

However, in a big coup for Joe Biden, Arizona is more likely to turn blue in 2020 than to remain Trump. 

<canvas id='g20' name="brgraph" data-file-name="ArizonaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[Florida](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/florida-polls-and-election-betting)**

The famous swing state was instrumental for Donald Trump in 2016.

Florida is currently looking blue.

<canvas id='g21' name="brgraph" data-file-name="FloridaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[Georgia](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/georgia-polls-and-election-betting)**

[](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/georgia-polls-and-election-betting)16 Electoral Votes at stake, and Trump beat Hilary by 5.2% in 2016. 

We're betting he holds on by a slimmer margin in 2020.

<canvas id='g32' name="brgraph" data-file-name="GeorgiaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Iowa**

They voted for Obama and Clinton. And even Al Gore. 

But Trump won by a landslide in 2016. How will Iowa vote in 2020?

<canvas id='g22' name="brgraph" data-file-name="IowaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Michigan**

Trump collected the 16 Electoral votes by 0.2% in 2016! 

But they voted for the Democrats in the six previous elections.

The betting data says this swing is nearly a lock to the blue team.

<canvas id='g23' name="brgraph" data-file-name="MichiganOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Minnesota**

The last 11 elections have been won by the Democratic Party.

Biden should make it 12.

<canvas id='g24' name="brgraph" data-file-name="MinnesotaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **New Hampshire**

Hilary won by 0.4% in 2016.

The betting data says the margin will be bigger for Biden in 2020.

<canvas id='g25' name="brgraph" data-file-name="NewHampshireOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[North Carolina](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/north-carolina-polls-and-election-betting)**

[](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/north-carolina-polls-and-election-betting)A fascinating coin toss with 15 Electoral Colleges votes on offer.

Trump won easily in 2016 and the voting history is comprehensively Republican.

<canvas id='g26' name="brgraph" data-file-name="NorthCarolinaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[Ohio](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/ohio-polls-and-election-betting)**

They've voted Clinton, Clinton, Bush, Bush, Obama, Obama, Trump.

They like back to back terms and the current betting data suggests they'll vote in Trump again.

<canvas id='g27' name="brgraph" data-file-name="OhioOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[Pennsylvania](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/pennsylvania-polls-and-election-betting)**

Trump triumphed in 2016 but the previous six elections were blue.

The market suggests 20 Elecotral Votes are returning to the Democratic Party. 

<canvas id='g28' name="brgraph" data-file-name="PennsylvaniaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[Texas](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/texas-polls)**

The polls think this is a coin toss but the betting data knows better.

Texas is red, no matter how alternative Austin becomes.

<canvas id='g29' name="brgraph" data-file-name="TexasOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **[Wisconsin](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/wisconsin-polls-and-election-betting)**

They voted for the Democratic Candidate on the previous seven elections, before choosing Donald Trump in 2016.

<canvas id='g30' name="brgraph" data-file-name="WisconsinOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats"  data-colors="#0000ff,#ff0000" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **US Election Odds**

Now that we've looked at all the battleground swing states, let's look at the US Presidency probabilities.

### **Trump vs Biden:**

<canvas id='g1' name="brgraph" data-file-name="Election_odds_json.json" data-only-names="Donald Trump,Joe Biden" data-colors="#ff0000,#0000ff" data-start="2020-03-04 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **How Are These US Election Odds Created?**

It doesnâ€™t rely on biased opinions or inaccurate polls. It exclusively relies on **[The Wisdom Of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)** from people trading on **Betfair**. 

That's people all over the world betting against each other. Swapping opinion with weight of money. There's no better source. 

Across all the markets, up to **$1 billion USD** will be traded on the US Election. 

You will not find a more accurate data source for 2020 US Presidential Election predictions.

- - -

## **More US Election Odds**

We're determined to give you the most accurate prediction data in the world. Simply by reflecting betting data.

Make sure you check out

* **[Biden VP Odds](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/biden-vp-odds)**

With many more exclusive pages to come.
title: Swing States: Live 2020 US Election Predictions
seoTitle: Swing States: Live 2020 US Election Data & Predictions
description: Let's look at the most influential Swing States for the 2020 US Election. We'll list them and share live predictions for each based on the most accurate source. Not polls, but betting data.
